sentences.en: A hornet stung me on the cheek.

sentences.en: Each year, around 70 humans die from giant hornet stings.

His criticisms of the president stirred up a hornet's nest.

sentences.en: His letter to the newspaper about racialism in schools has stirred up a real hornet's nest.

sentences.en: I wonder how different the hornet tissues actually are from those of that butterfly.

sentences.en: If you are really angry, you might say you are mad as a hornet.
sentences.cn: 如果你真的很生气, 你可以说你疯的像黄蜂一样.

sentences.en: Jim stirred up a real hornet's nest when he questioned salaries paid to council officials.

sentences.en: The body shell of the Oriental hornet converts sunlight into electricity. Go figure.

sentences.en: The boy really stirred up a hornet's nest by talking back to his father.
